text: Neil Robertson (born 11 February 1982) is an Australian snooker player. He was made champion and put into the top professional ranks in the 2006 - 2007 season. Neil Robertson is the most successful player from outside the United Kingdom in the sport's history. He plays left-handed.UK Championship: Neil Robertson thrashed by Yan Bingtao in York - BBC Sport == References == Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Snooker players Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne
title: Neil Robertson
